tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crimes (
  crime_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  crime_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  suspects TEXT[],
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE suspects (
    suspect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    suspect_name VARCHAR(50),
    suspect_gender VARCHAR(10),
    suspect_age INT,
    crime_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (crime_id) REFERENCES crimes(crime_id)
);

CREATE TABLE interventions (
    intervention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    intervention_type VARCHAR(50),
    intervention_date DATE,
    crime_id INT,
    suspect_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (crime_id) REFERENCES crimes(crime_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (suspect_id) REFERENCES suspects(suspect_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crime_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE suspects (
    suspect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interventions (
    intervention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    intervention_date DATE,
    type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE crime_statistics (
    stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    count INT,
    year INT
);

CREATE TABLE crimes (
 crime_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 crime_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 date_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE suspects (
 suspect_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 age INT NOT NULL,
 address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE victims (
 victim_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 age INT NOT NULL,
 contact_info VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE suspects_crimes (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 suspect_id INT NOT NULL,
 crime_id INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE victims_crimes (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 victim_id INT NOT NULL,
 crime_id INT NOT NULL
)
